Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsthere were four of us standing on my back porch when a large, increasingly bright orange\white sphere appeared in the western sky. fly right at us about 3 seconds then veered off north and then just vanished. then again alter that night we saw another similar light in the exact same spot that flew right over us, that had a smaller green light around it that flew right over us then disappeared with a plane in the sky headed to the airport.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Gillette
There were no other sightings in Gillette on or around July 23rd 2013
Summary: It was like a giant orange glowing sphere in the sky that fly right at us for 10s the disappeared
